channel.title: I've done everything and people still cannot logon to my server?
channel.description:
People are having trouble logging into my server and they get an error saying it's offline WHILE I have the source running. Here's everything I've done:
I've port forwarded 43594, this isn't hard to do since it's the only number that needs to be forwarded. I turned off my Windows default Firewall and I've shut off my Routers firewall. In GUI.java I've set SERVERIP to my hostname "despairscape.servegame.com" that I got through NO-IP I've had NO-IP Duc and I checked if the hostname had any updates, but no. I've ran the source and client, I'm able to login but other people cannot. If someone can help me with this problem I'd be very thankful. Thanks in advance.
Side Note: I'm able to login with the serverip set to "despairscape.servegame.com" but other people can't? When I login it says something like "Connection from localhost 127.0.0.1" or something alike. What am I missing here?

item.title: I've done everything and people still cannot logon to my server?
item.dc:creator: @marcman906 marcman906
item.description:
@marcman906 wrote:

Did you compile after changing the IP?

Read full topic

item.title: I've done everything and people still cannot logon to my server?

item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

People are having trouble logging into my server and they get an error saying it’s offline WHILE I have the source running. Here’s everything I’ve done:

I’ve port forwarded 43594, this isn’t hard to do since it’s the only number that needs to be forwarded.
I turned off my Windows default Firewall and I’ve shut off my Routers firewall.
In GUI.java I’ve set SERVERIP to my hostname “despairscape.servegame.com” that I got through NO-IP
I’ve had NO-IP Duc and I checked if the hostname had any updates, but no.
I’ve ran the source and client, I’m able to login but other people cannot. If someone can help me with this problem I’d be very thankful. Thanks in advance.

Side Note: I’m able to login with the serverip set to “despairscape.servegame.com” but other people can’t?
When I login it says something like “Connection from localhost 127.0.0.1” or something alike.
What am I missing here?
